post_title: FS: T206 Nap Lajoie with bat - SGC
post_content:
Didn’t plan to sell but need to raise funds for another purchase. This is a really clean presenting Nap Lajoie (with bat) - Piedmont 350 back, graded SGC 1.  The card has a small tear near the top left corner (see pics) that doesn’t really distract from its great eye appeal for the technical grade. 

Asking $450 net to me (including shipping) but will entertain reasonable offers. 

Thanks!
